**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Scarlet Triad Sneak](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1549) **Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 8 **Perception** +12 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +14 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +0 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +2 **Items** [_bloodseeker beak_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=201) (affixed to rapier), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (3), [keys to manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [average manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) (marked with the symbol of the Scarlet Triad), _+1 [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)_, [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58) --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +10 **Ref** +14 **Will** +12 **HP** 95 **Nimble Dodge** **Requirement** A sneak can't use this reaction while [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12). **Trigger** The sneak is hit by an attack made by a creature the sneak can see. **Effect** The sneak gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their Armor Class against the triggering attack.
**Deny Advantage** The sneak isn't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), or flanking creatures of 6th level or lower, or creatures of 6th level or lower using surprise attack.
**Mobility** When the sneak takes a Stride action to move half their Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _rapier_ +17 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6+5 piercing **Melee** dagger +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **Ranged** dagger +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **Efficient Capture** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The sneak has [manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) in hand and is adjacent to a creature. **Effect** The sneak attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If the sneak succeeds at an attack roll with a +16 modifier against the target's AC, they apply the manacles. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** 2d6 **Surprise Attack** In the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the sneak.
name: Scarlet Triad Sneak
